name: Mental Health Services (Care Line)
description: Telephone Counselors are available 6 pm - midnight PST. every night of the week. If calling outside of our night shift hours, you may leave a voicemail and someone will be in contact. Care Line is open to callers regardless of their need, be it loneliness, isolation, grief or anger, relationships, jobs, or illness, suicidal thoughts, depression, or anxiety. Care Line is for everyone. Caregivers are encouraged to call as well!!
